styles.container: width: 100% !important; table-layout: fixed; border-collapse: collapse; border: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; max-width: 100vw;

title.h1: font-weight: bold; margin: 32px 0 24px; font-size: 2em; color: #0f7850; letter-spacing: -0.03em; border-bottom: 2px solid #1a9d6a; padding-bottom: 0.3em;
title.h2: font-weight: bold; margin: 28px 0 20px; font-size: 1.5em; color: #159461; letter-spacing: -0.02em; border-left: 4px solid #1a9d6a; padding-left: 12px;
title.h3: font-weight: bold; margin: 24px 0 16px; font-size: 1.25em; color: #1a9d6a; letter-spacing: -0.01em;

list.taskList: list-style: none; margin-left: -24px; font-size: 1em; color: #4a4a4a; line-height: 1.8;

code.block: background: #f4faf7; padding: 0.5em 1em 1em; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre; overflow-x: auto; word-wrap: normal; color: #333; margin: 1.2em 0; border: 1px solid #e6f3ed; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(15,120,80,0.05); width: 100%;
code.inline: background: #f4faf7; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #333; font-size: 14px; font-family: Operator Mono, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; border: 1px solid #e6f3ed;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #1a9d6a; border-radius: 6px; padding: 16px 20px; background: #f4faf7; margin: 0.8em 0; color: #159461; font-style: italic; font-size: 1em; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block;
styles.link: color: #159461; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #1a9d6a; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #e6f3ed;
table.header: background: #f4faf7; font-weight: bold; color: #4a4a4a; border-bottom: 2px solid #e6f3ed; font-size: 1em;
